lowPoly.name: Low Poly
lowPoly.text: The plan for this project was to minimize polygon usage, and create low poly character in a small environment. Simple colors and simple shapes are main points of presentation, with implication of fantasy world theme.

blocks.text: Birds and the cat were small additions to liven the atmosphere. It should give a bit of feel of Lego world.
The character was rigged and face texture was added to give certain cuteness to it.
